model

Interface CycleState

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DatabaseUpdateState, FiringRulesState, SolvingGoalState

    interface CycleState
    This is the interface to implement in order to add steps to the cycle. Currently there are three steps: DatabaseUpdateState, FiringRulesState and SolvingGoalState.
    Author:
    Alexandre Camus
    See Also:
    CycleHandler

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void handlerMethod(CycleHandler STATE_CONTEXT, String NAME, RuleSet events)
      Sends the request to the current state to operate its behavior.

    • Method Detail

      • handlerMethod

        void handlerMethod(CycleHandler STATE_CONTEXT,
                 String NAME,
                 RuleSet events)
                   throws CloneNotSupportedException
        Sends the request to the current state to operate its behavior.

        This method should be the only way to perform the action of a state. It is called by the handlerMethod() of the class CycleHandler which manages the cycles.

        Parameters:
        STATE_CONTEXT - the manager of the state which is here the only instance of CycleHandler.
        NAME - the name of the step. It has no use except to debug.
        events - an object RuleSet that contains the events/actions that will be or have been performed during the very cycle.
        Throws:
        CloneNotSupportedException
